name: Final Cube
description:
Made for the Bullet hell jam.

(Weapon changes and enemies spawn every 10 seconds.)

You are the last robot that hasn't turned evil. And you have guns... In Final Cube you as the player fight off waves of evil robots who want to kill you.

There is no end goal as of yet outside of getting a high score.

Credits:

Music is made by Lightspeed6

Explosion from the RPG is from a asset pack on the ue4 marketplace

Level textures are from Quixel megascans.
